Sentencas: The increase of intermittent renewable energy contribution in power grids has urged us to seek means for temporal decoupling of electricity production and consumption.
Titulo: Process modeling of a reversible solid oxide cell (r-SOC) energy storage system utilizing commercially available SOC reactor

Sentencas: A reversible solid oxide cell (r-SOC) enables storage of surplus electricity through electrochemical reactions when it is in electrolysis mode.

Sentencas: The reserved energy in form of chemical compounds is then converted to electricity when the cell operates as a fuel cell.

Sentencas: A process system model was implemented using Aspen Plus (R) V8.8 based on a commercially available r-SOC reactor experimentally characterized at DLR.

Sentencas: In this study a complete self-sustaining system configuration is designed by optimal thermal integration and balance of plant.

Sentencas: Under reference conditions a round trip efficiency of 54.3% was achieved.

Sentencas: Generated heat in fuel cell mode is exploited by latent heat storage tanks to enable endothermic operation of reactor in its electrolysis mode.

Sentencas: In total, out of 100 units of thermal energy stored in heat storage tanks during fuel cell mode, 90% was utilized to offset heat demand of system in its electrolysis mode.

Sentencas: Parametric analysis revealed the significance of heat storage tanks in thermal management even when reactor entered its exothermic mode of electrolysis.
